speaker: Dr_Arasato
text: Last month a fifty-eight year old patient came to me. High blood pressure. Stiff arteries. Doctor said he needed medication.
title: ep_japanese_foods_p1

speaker: Dr_Arasato
text: I gave him a list. Five Japanese foods.

speaker: Dr_Arasato
text: Three months later his arterial age dropped twelve years. No pills.
brolls: happy healthy man smiling confident outdoor
